3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Cynthia Teplin - Agt: 925-451-1729 - VIEWS!! Enjoy the wonderful unobstructed view of the mountains, hills and trees from the living room or the enclosed large sun room and open air portion (approx. 265 sq ft.)  of this beautifully maintained property. The main bedroom suite boasts a separate closet, heat light and small skylight in bathroom.  The additional bathroom has a stackable washer/dryer in a louver closet.  Fresh paint throughout, ready for immediate move in! There is a security office, bus service to BART and downtown Walnut Creek plus many additional benefits.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Drew A Plaisted - Agt: 925-639-9929 - Fully renovated Sequoia model with expansive view overlooking the Rossmoor's rolling hills is available now! This unit has all new interior materials, electrical and plumbing. The entire interior has been rebuilt by the Co-Op/HOA from the studs, due to fire damage in 2021. The owner then chose to upgrade all of the appliances to high end GE Cafe models, as well as upgrading the windows, interior finishes, and fixtures. The kitchen now has quartz counters and luxury vinyl plank floors. The kitchen and bath plumbing, electrical, HVAC, and water heater are new and maintenance is still covered by the HOA for life. All of the drywall, insulation, doors, moldings, windows (dual pane), ceilings and flooring are brand new. This home has not been lived in since the construction was completed on 10/21/23. The carport is conveniently located close by. This is an opportunity to be the first person to live in a lovely home that has zero wear and tear in the First Mutual with a more affordable coupon.

Public Remarks: This completely updated home features an open floor plan with an elegant living room, a decorative electric fireplace with optional heat, and an open patio displaying beautiful views and a southern exposure. The spacious entrance, smooth & coffered ceilings, recessed LED lighting, water resistant engineered flooring, and new windows and doors throughout shows attention to detail and high quality.  You’ll love the chef’s kitchen with quartz counters, custom cabinets with under-cabinet task lights, designer backsplash, high-end stainless steel appliances, complete with an over-range pot filler, a stylish island with bar seating, and plenty of extra pantry/storage. The spa-inspired main bath offers double sinks, a ceiling- mounted rain shower head as well as a handheld shower wand. In unit full size laundry and a tankless water heater brings in the most practical and easy standards to your every day living. A Real Gem!
